sec.div: 2.4.2. Change of Transmission Region, PTI due to Predicted Climate Change
sec.p: We compared the spatial extent of the sensitive potential transmission region at two time periods: 2021–2050 vs. baseline 1961–1990 and 2071–2100 vs. baseline. We highlighted the change of PTI between the two time periods to present the transmission intensity difference due to the predicted climate change.
